title: How to write acknowledgement for a school assignment - Quora

response.answer_text: It is a very genuine take to thanks people who helps you complete your task. And when it comes to assignment writing, acknowledgement becomes necessary. Nowadays every student is asked to write an assignment, but it is quite understood that completing it on own is not possible every time; therefore, he/she might need help with assignment. So, the assignment’s acknowledgement is all about thanking those people. Let’s learn with the help of video :
